QuestData.Title: Dask "The Flask" Gobfizzle
QuestData.Description: Hey - you must be that $g fella': lass; that Wulfred was talkin' about! The one who found the ogre artifact, and helped him test out those strange stones from up north. Welcome to the digsite, $n!$b$bWe were actually working on identifying those samples right as you got here. Would you mind bringing the sample over to Dask? I need him to help me find out how old it is.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Opened Mosh'Ogg Bounty to Dask "The Flask" Gobfizzle at the Explorers' League Digsite in the Cape of Stranglethorn.
QuestData.CompletionText: You got something that needs mixing?
QuestData.RewardText: So once again, it falls upon tiny Dask to get the Explorers' League work done! Alright... let's see what you've got in there.
